message.content:
cs.SD, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.AR

Reasoning: 
1. cs.SD (Signal Processing): The paper focuses on developing a real-time speech recognition system using an FPGA, which involves signal processing techniques for acoustic modeling. 
2. cs.CL (Computation and Language): The paper involves language modeling techniques for speech recognition, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
3. cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper uses recurrent neural networks for speech recognition, which is a machine learning technique. 
4. cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing): The paper specifically uses neural networks for speech recognition, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
5. cs.AR (Hardware Architecture): The paper involves implementing the speech recognition system on an FPGA, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
